name: PrincessQuest
description:
The game best played with 16:10 ratio.

Princess Quest is a non-commercial RPG game that was designed as a parody to Dragon Quest series from Square Enix. Using the same character sprites and  soundtracks along with some tweak in storyline, Princess Quest seeks to replicate the experience of this old school RPG in a first person perspective.

This is a student project. It is not meant to be used for commercial context.

We hope you enjoy the game.

Palmmy&Amber
